channel.title: Blog on Qu Yichen
channel.description: Recent content in Blog on Qu Yichen

item.title: My first solo album <Shanghai Cake> released
item.description: This album contains 11 tunes. All were composed, arranged, and mixed individually from 2022 to 2023. Tune List Dark Secrets Claps Elephant Dancing Sweet Koto Taoyuan is Raining Break That Television A Night in Shanghai Joyness Gliding Low Tibetan Bowl Silent Night (Bonus Track) Please check them out on Spotify, Youtube Music, Apple Music, Netease Music, Tencent Music, and etc.

item.title: Taichung MRT soundscape project Contribution
item.description: 文華高中站 http://sndup.net/bmng 文心森林公園站 http://sndup.net/nyj7 舊社站 http://sndup.net/wvzt 北屯總站 http://sndup.net/y2c3 台中捷運高鐵站 http://sndup.net/wz64 All 5 tunes were composed individually in 2023.
